mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY p.product_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (category_id, product_name, description, product_price, discount_rate, product_img, product_regdate, product_update) VALUES (#{categoryId},#{productName},#{description},#{productPrice},#{discountRate},#{productImg}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, description = #{description}, product_price = #{productPrice}, discount_rate = #{discountRate}, product_img = #{productImg}, product_update = NOW() WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_img, product_regdate, category_id FROM product ORDER BY product_regdate DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_img, p.product_regdate, p.category_id, c.category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY p.product_regdate DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM product WHERE (product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY product_regdate DESC

SELECT * FROM product WHERE 1=1
AND (product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND category_id = #{categoryId}
AND product_price >= #{minPrice}
AND product_price <= #{maxPrice}
ORDER BY
product_price
product_name
product_regdate
product_regdate
ASC
DESC

SELECT p.*, COALESCE(order_count, 0) as order_count FROM product p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oi.product_id, COUNT(*) as order_count FROM orderitem oi JOIN custorder co ON oi.order_id = co.order_id WHERE co.order_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY oi.product_id ) popular ON p.product_id = popular.product_id ORDER BY order_count DESC, p.product_regdate DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM product WHERE discount_rate > 0 ORDER BY discount_rate DESC, product_regdate DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM product WHERE product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT #{limit}
